text:
Sometimes, users quit their browsers prematurely, leading to locked files.
adding an admin option to break the lock would be helpful.
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
A possibel approach is described here:
http://wiki.apache.org/lenya/DefaultPublicationUsefulChanges
(section 4.1)
creator: tschlabach@apache.org
bobharner@gmail.com
text:
Correction, that link is 
http://wiki.apache.org/lenya/HowToDefaultPublicationUsefulChanges, in the
section "Allow users to override checkouts by other users".

See this thread on the mailing list too:

http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/lenya-dev/200601.mbox/%3c43BC2E20.8000500@wyona.com%3e

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: *** Bug 42512 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
